document.full_text: a helicopter crashed on sunday while lifting equipment from the top of a low-rise office and laboratory building at raytheon co.'s aerospace development complex near los angeles, but the pilot survived.
document.title: pilot survives helicopter crash at raytheon near l.a.
lines_and_colors: a helicopter crashed on sunday while lifting equipment from the top of a low-rise office and laboratory building at raytheon co.'s aerospace development complex near los angeles, but the pilot survived.
